channel.title: Clean Energy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Clean Energy on FinanClub

item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:110 Chances: Plug Power, Inc. provides alternative energy technology in the form of hydrogen and fuel cell systems. The hydrogen and fuel cell market is expected to play a crucial role in lowering emissions. Sustainable transport stocks have reached new heights, making them prime investment opportunities.

item.title: ARRY
item.description: score:8 Chances: The solar energy industry is experiencing a surge in demand and interest, driven by increased government support and consumer incentives. Array Technologies, Inc. has recently appointed Jessica Lawrence-Vaca as senior vice president, indicating a focus on policy and external affairs to drive growth.
